thought.text: The current implementation looks correct. Let me check if there might have been an issue with how VLA data was handled in the past. Let me look at the git history to see what changes were made to the VLA comparison logic:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmp1_6k5dg_/astropy && git log -p --since="2020-01-01" -- astropy/io/fits/diff.py | grep -A 20 -B 20 "P.*in.*col\|allclose.*arra" | head -50
